settings.title: Saitunan
settings.subtitle: Kula da asusun ku da saitunan shago
settings.noStoreMessage: Har yanzu ba ku da shago. Ƙirƙiri shagon ku na farko don farawa.
settings.storeNameUpdated: An sabunta sunan shago cikin nasara
settings.storeLocationUpdated: An sabunta wurin shago cikin nasara
settings.storeMarketUpdated: An sabunta kasuwar shago cikin nasara
settings.hideBalanceDesc: Lokacin da aka kunna, za a ɓoye bayanan kuɗi daga dashboard
settings.languageDescription: Zaɓi yaren da kuke so don taken kananan rubutu da taken sassa
settings.mobileAppInstallation: Shigar da Manhaja ta Wayar Hannu
settings.installDescription: Samu mafi kyawun gogewa da manhaja ta wayar hannu - tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba, saurin lodawa, da sanarwar turawa!
settings.worksOffline: Tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba
settings.manualInstallDesc: Yi amfani da zaɓin 'Ƙara zuwa Allo na Gida' na burauzar ku don shigar da manhaja
settings.installationStartedDesc: Bi umarnin burauzar ku don kammala shigarwa.
settings.installationFailedDesc: Don Allah sake gwadawa ko amfani da zaɓin 'Ƙara zuwa Allo na Gida' na burauzar ku.
settings.installToastDesc: Samu mafi kyawun gogewa da manhaja ta wayar hannu - tana aiki ba tare da intanet ba, saurin lodawa, da sanarwar turawa!
settings.installDismissedDesc: Kuna iya shigar da manhaja daga baya daga Saitunan.
settings.appAlreadyInstalled: An Riga An Shigar da Manhaja
settings.appInstalledDesc: Kuna amfani da manhaja ta wayar hannu ta SheBalance. Ji daɗin ingantaccen gogewa!

help.title: Cibiyar Taimako

help.description: Nemo amsoshin tambayoyinku ku koyi yadda ake amfani da SheBalance da kyau

help.comingSoon: Yana Zuwa Ba Da Daɗewa Ba
help.learnInYourLanguage: Koyi Rubuta Littattafai a Cikin Yaren Ku
help.audioTutorialsDescription: An tsara koyarwar mu ta sauti don taimaka muku fahimtar ra'ayoyin rubuta littattafai a cikin yaren da kuke so. Kowace koyarwa tana rufe mahimman batutuwa kamar rubuta ma'amaloli, kula da asusai, da kiyaye ingantattun bayanan kuɗi.
